bill_title: provide for a discount to senior citizens for state parks and recreation areas.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to provide for a discount to senior citizens for state parks and recreation areas. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added: 41-17-13.5. State parks and recreation areas--Fees--Discounts--Promulgation of rules. Any resident over the age of sixty-five may obtain a ten percent discount to any South Dakota state park or recreation area and may receive a ten percent discount on any camping fee or associated electrical service fee established pursuant to § 41-17-1.1 or 41-17-14.1. Any person who applies for and qualifies for discounted admission under the provisions of this section shall be issued a special park entrance license by the Department of Game, Fish and Parks. The Game, Fish and Parks Commission shall promulgate rules, pursuant to chapter 1-26, establishing criteria and procedures for the administration of the discount and for the issuance of a special park entrance license under this section.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
